div.p: In the following fragment, the term "GDO" is first defined in the first paragraph, then used in the second.
div.pre:
The GDO is a device that allows off-world teams to open the iris.

Teal'c activated his GDO and so Hammond ordered the iris to be opened.
div.p: With the addition of an a element, the reference can be made explicit:
div.pre:
The GDO is a device that allows off-world teams to open the iris.

Teal'c activated his GDO and so Hammond ordered the iris to be opened.
